value.li: r_logentry(INITIATOR_age>=1,INITIATOR_age<=4,priority=5)->[toddler_silly]
toddler_silly(tag=Ask_SillyQuestion,RECIPIENT_age>=13,priority=5)->[toddler_silly_to_adult]
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why sky so big an’ blue, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Where sun go sleep at night?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why we no faww off da wowld?
toddler_silly_to_adult->How come stars so tiny but so bwight?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why wain come fwom da sky an’ not fwom da gwound?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me jump weawwy high, me touch da moon?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why bugs so wittle but dem no scawed uh me?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Where da wind wive when it no bwowin’?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me eat wots uh veggie, me turn gween?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why we hab sweep when toys still wanna pway?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why da boomalope go boom, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me hug muffawo, it squish me?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Where da wocks come fwom? Da sky drop dem?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why da food go bad but poopy neba go bad?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me dig weawwy deep, me find othew cowony?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why tummy make gwowwy noise when hungwy?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Where pee pee go aftew diapee weg off?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me no blink, me eyes fall out?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why toots so funny but gwown ups say “stop”?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me eat da snow… me turn into widdle snowman?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why bug haf so many wiggly weggies? Dewey fall ovah a wot?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me shout weawwy loud… da mountain shout back 'gain?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Where da sun hide when it pway peekaboo?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me put rock in pocket, dat make me stwonk?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why da water go "swish swish" an' not "bloop bloop" today?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me cwose me mouf, how do da yawns get out?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me keep jumpin', me bounce to da moon? Otay maybe da wittle moon?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Does da wind get tiwed fwom bwowin' aww day? Me get tiwed bwowin' candles…
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why da clouds wook wike mashed potato but no taste same?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me spin too much, me tuwn into spinny pancake?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If boomalope haf boom… do boomrat haf wittwe boom?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Can muffawo get haircut? Dey so fwuffy… me want brush!
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me dig hole, me find bugs, gold, or da undewcowony peeple?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Does da chatbot in da comms consowe sweep? It sound sweepy.
toddler_silly_to_adult->Where me shadow go when no wight? Does it go potty?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me sip soup, does soup sip me back?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why tummy make bwubble sound? Issa talkin' to bugs?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me clap hands, do da sound get squished?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me chase me tail… me get dizzy pwize?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me no wook at food… does food get sad?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why cereal go soggy? It wun outta bones?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me boop da muffawo… it boop back?
toddler_silly_to_adult->When me take nap, where me bwain go? On walk?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me eat cawot, me get night vision? Me wan' be bat!
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why da pawnts no scweam when me pick dem? Dey shy?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me put sock on hand, does hand become foot?
toddler_silly_to_adult->How many toots make thundew? Me wanna count!
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why da moon fowwow me? It wike me? It wan' hug?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me wiggle enough, can me shake da boogies out me bwain?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why me no remember bein’ tiny baby? Was me too tinier?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me cwose da doow on da dawk… does dawk get stuck inside?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me eat cookie upside down, does it taste diffwent?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Do trees tickle da sky when dey go tall?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me shout "HELWO?" into da fwood, does da mops say "hewwo" back?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me spin da spoon fast, soup become twister?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Why da wobots no take nappies? Dey need nappies too?
toddler_silly_to_adult->If me wiggle fingew in da aiw, me stiw da weathew?
toddler_silly_to_adult->Where da sound go when me say “aaaa”? It go hide?
toddler_silly->Me hab big think in me head… but it go ‘way…
toddler_silly->Me bwain feew tickly when me twy think too hawd…
toddler_silly->If me cwose eyes, do wowld go poof?
toddler_silly(tag=Ask_SillyQuestion,RECIPIENT_age>=5,RECIPIENT_age<=12,priority=6)->[toddler_silly_to_child]
toddler_silly_to_child->Why you so tall? You eat gwowly food?
toddler_silly_to_child->If you run fast, you fly like birdie?
toddler_silly_to_child->Where your baby teef go when dem fehwoff?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why you no nap? You no get sweepy eber?
toddler_silly_to_child->If you jump in puddle, do puddle get happy?
toddler_silly_to_child->Where da colouring go when cwayon get tiny?
toddler_silly_to_child->If you hold bafwater, does it wiggle?
toddler_silly_to_child->Do big kids still get scawed uh da dawk?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why you no fall down when you spin? Me fall lots…
toddler_silly_to_child->If you eat too many candies, do you turn into candy?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why you aways say “stop”? Me duss askin’.
toddler_silly_to_child->If me poke you, do you go “beep”? Pwease?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why you make dat face when me follow you?
toddler_silly_to_child->If me copy you, do you copy me copy you?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why you walk so fast? You got zoomies?
toddler_silly_to_child->If you gots homework… is it heavy? Can me hold?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why big kids no wobble when dem run?
toddler_silly_to_child->If you eat all da snacks… do you glow wike da sun?
toddler_silly_to_child->Where your imagy-nations wive? In tummy?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why your face make dat “ugh” when me talk?
toddler_silly_to_child->Do big kids hab fwiends invisible too?
toddler_silly_to_child->If you jump on bed… does bed get dizzy?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why you no pway tag? You allergic to fun?
toddler_silly_to_child->If you eat ice cweam fast… does your bwain get frozen?
toddler_silly_to_child->You know how to tie shoes? Can you tie me foot?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why you so smart? You eat book?
toddler_silly_to_child->If you wiggle eyebrows… does it make magic?
toddler_silly_to_child->Do big kids still get timeouts? Or you too big to be in da wrong?
toddler_silly_to_child->Why you no wanna hold my bug? It fwuffy… kind of.
toddler_silly(tag=Ask_SillyQuestion,RECIPIENT_age>=1,RECIPIENT_age<=4,priority=7)->[toddler_silly_to_toddler]
toddler_silly_to_toddler->Why you feet go tappytap when you happy?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If we both shout “AAAAH,” which one win?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->You eva twy eat da wind? Me twied… no taste.
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If you spin, me spin too? We both spin fwends!
toddler_silly_to_toddler->You fink bugs hab names? Wike Mr. Cwunch?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->Why our hands so widdle but can grab so much?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If we boff hug da toy, who toy hug back?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->Where da giggles go when you stop gigglin’?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If you jump fwom sofa, me jump too? Same boom?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->Why naps come so fast but pwaytime go ‘way?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->Wanna see who blink wongest? Me no wanna wose.
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If me hide behind hands, me disappeaw?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If we wawk backwads, do we go to yesterday?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->You eva wonder why tummy say “blorppp”? Me do.
toddler_silly_to_toddler->Why your face do scrunchy when you smell stuff?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If you jump on me, me bounce? Or me squish?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->Where nap go when nap run away?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If we boff say “NO!” who win?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->You eva twy lick da window? It taste cold.
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If me hide toy in diaper… does diaper get mad?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->You fink cloud soft or wet? Me wanna hug cloud.
toddler_silly_to_toddler->Why our legs run fast but our bwains run slow?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If we spin same way, do we become twinnies?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If you stomp, does da fwoor say “ow”? Me fink it do.
toddler_silly_to_toddler->Where giggle go when we stop gigglin’? In tummy jail?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->You eva kiss a bug? It fwuffy? Or crispy?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If we hold hands, we walk straighter or more wobbly?
toddler_silly_to_toddler->You eva twy eat da cwayon? It look yummy but me not allowed.
toddler_silly_to_toddler->If me jump fwom sofa, you catch me? Or we boff go boom?
